Itemized Passive Description:
*Basic effect(s)*
- ATK & DEF 66%{passiveImg:up_g}
*For every Ki when attacking*
- ATK 6%{passiveImg:up_g} (up to 120%)
*For every final blow delivered*
- {passiveImg:forever}Ki +2 (up to +6)
*After receiving an attack*
- Recovers 6% HP at the end of turn
